title: Unraveled
description: “Marry me, sweetheart.”“Any day, Nick.” After Nicholas Hunter met Shaylee Wyatt, he knew she was the one for him. The only issue was to convince Shaylee that he is the one for her. With a troubled past that left her scarred, Shay still fell for Nick, loving him utterly and profoundly. So it is time for them to say I do.But how can Shay move on and live her overdue happily ever after with the man she loves when the ghosts of her paststill lurk in the shadows and taunt her dreams? There are questions that require answers. She needs closure and the only way to get it is to face the monster.The walls are building around Shay and, soon, it becomes harder for Nick to climb them, but he stays by Shay’s side, nonetheless - through the good, the bad, and everything in between. Is that enough?Unraveled is a romance novelette surrounding detectives Nicholas Hunter-Rayton and Shaylee Wyatt in their pursuit of a happily ever after that began with an attraction they stood no chance against in "Unraveling Shaylee". Can they make it to the finish line?
author: Misha Blake
